Scope 1 and 2 emissions performance is measured from a FY20 baseline using the Scope 2 market-based greenhouse gas (GHG) accounting methodology from the GHG Protocol Scope 2 Guidance and track our emissions aligning to the Science-Based Target initiative (SBTi) Corporate Net-Zero Standard. FY20 Scope 1 & 2 baseline has been revised from 23,640 tCO2-e to 18,707 tCO2-e to ensure alignment with the GHG Protocol Scope 2 Guidance

8. Calculated with 12 months of reporting ending December 2022. Only includes those entities eligible to be included in Payment Times Reporting and have been reported to the regulator.
